description: Ragnarok (Old Norse: Ragnarök or Ragnarøkkr) is the prophesied end of the cosmos in Norse mythology—a series of catastrophic events culminating in a great battle that will result in the deaths of numerous gods, the destruction of the Nine Realms, and the submersion of the world in water. Yet from this destruction, a new world will arise, purified and renewed.
name: Norse Cosmology
